data.name: The Gardener and the Wild Vine Demo
data.detailed_description:
Leap and slash at flowers growing on the vines to propel yourself up. Chain them together to go fast, but watch your step! Every level is a unique fantastical tower with new mechanics being introduced regularly. Attacking flowers grows new procedural vines with leaves to jump on. Carefully balance leaping upward while watching how the vines will grow to plan your ascent. You'll need quick reflexes and even faster wit to reach the top!


Travel from tower to tower in search of the missing prince, braving environmental hazards and unique mechanics from visually stunning and diverse locations. Follow The Gardener and The Knight as they quest to rescue The Prince in this fairy tale that explores love and all the pain and risks that come with it.


Need to prove your skill? The game doesn't end even after completing the story... Take on levels in Challenge Mode with added objectives and significantly more difficult win-conditions.

data.short_description: Leap, slash, and climb your way to the top of fantastical towers in this unique story-based platformer where platforms spawn as you climb procedurally grown vines.

fullgame.name: The Gardener and the Wild Vines

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Pentium G620 (2.5 Ghz dual core) or equivalent
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 730 or equivalent with 1 GB VRAM, 1280x720 display
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Work in progress: new features may raise the requirements, optimizations may lower the requirements
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i5-2300 (2.8 GHz quad core) or equivalent
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 750 or equivalent, 1920x1080 display
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Work in progress: new features may raise the requirements, optimizations may lower the requirements

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Sierra
  • Processor: 1.6GHz dual-core Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel UHD Graphics 617
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Work in progress: new features may raise the requirements, optimizations may lower the requirements
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Catalina
  • Processor: 2.3GHz dual-core Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel Iris Plus Graphics 640
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Work in progress: new features may raise the requirements, optimizations may lower the requirements
